greetings_response: 我们在哪一个方面可以提供更多信息 ？请点击下面的其中一个按钮, 向右滑动即可查看更多选项。
Confirm_Reservation: 您是否已经和我们酒店的确认了订房？
Thank_Stay_Know: 谢谢您对我们的酒店感到兴趣。我们在哪一个方面可以提供更多信息?
Thank_Room_Type: 谢谢选择滨海湾金沙, 请选择您最感兴趣的房间类型
Thank_MasterCard_Help: 感谢您对我们在万事达电影院的节目感到兴趣。 我们在哪一个方面可以提供更多信息？
Employement_FamilyMember: Are any of your family members or relatives currently employed by Marina Bay Sands?
Enquiries_EmailAddress: Please enter your email address first so we can follow up with your inquiry.
Enquiries_EnterEnquiry: Now enter your inquiry here and we will get back to you as soon as possible!
IsEmployed_FamilyMember: Please enter the name of your family member or relative working at Marina Bay Sands.
IsNotEmployed_InterestedArea: Thank you for your interest to be part of the Marina Bay Sands family. Please indicate your area of interest.
IsNotEmployed_CV: Please send your resume/CV to recruitment@marinabaysands.com stating the position you are interested in. Kindly note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. Thank you.
IsSRLMember_InterestedArea: Thank you for your interest to be part of the Marina Bay Sands family. Please indicate your area of interest.
IsSRLMember_InterestedArea_Prompt: 'Membership Points', 'SRL Discount Outlets', 'How to earn & redeem', 'Other Enquiries'
IsSRLMember_SRL_ID: Please enter your Sands Rewards Lifestyle membership ID.
IsSRLMember_Contact_No: Please enter your preferred contact number.
IsSRLMember_Enquiry: Please enter your inquiry here and we will get back to you as soon as possible!
SRLMembership_Member: Are you an existing Sands Rewards Lifestyle member?
WithRoomReservations_Question: Thanks for staying with us. Just a few questions to help us serve you better.
WithRoomReservations_Confirmation_ID: Please enter your room reservation confirmation ID.
WithRoomReservations_Leave_Msg: What can we assist you with? Leave us a message and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
